apple.name: Apple
apple.description: Crispy round fruit with sweet or tart flavor, commonly red, green, or yellow.
apple.benefits: High in fiber and vitamin C, promotes heart health.

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: Long curved tropical fruit with soft sweet flesh and a yellow peel when ripe.
banana.benefits: Rich in potassium, supports digestion, and provides quick energy.

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: Citrus fruit with a tough, bright orange rind and juicy, sweet-sour pulp.
orange.benefits: Excellent source of vitamin C, boosts immune system, and contains antioxidants.
